name: [X]CUBELABS
tag_list: mobile, apps, social, games, ebooks, entertainment, solutions
overview: [x]cube is a division of the larger mobile strategies company PurpleTalk, a progressive software leader developing new platforms for the digital space. To develop these platforms, PurpleTalk recruited a talented Design & Engineering team resulting in a portfolio of elegance and stability. In simple terms, PurpleTalk is the Research & Development department, while [x]cube is on the front-lines delivering mobile solutions to our client base. Having PurpleTalk as our backbone empowers us toÂ deliver simple solutions to complex problems by using different aspects of mobile technologies, from database server management and GPS mapping to analytic engines, social networks, as well as specialty solutions for problems submitted by our clients.Â  To do this, we unite top-tier designers and engineers to create the most sophisticated and elegant solutions possible.Â  The Apple iPhone and iPad are our platforms of choice, though we also develop for many other smart phone systems on the market; Android, Blackberry, Windows Mobile, Palm, among others.
